activeRumors.text: Travelers speak of Oianko Silvertongue. Ascending to royalty.
Levies rumored to secure textiles; officials say caravans delayed.
Merciful Council of Langton watches the markets quietly.
Sons of the Wheel watches the markets quietly.
The Steadfast Covenant watches the markets quietly.
Keepers of the Chalice watches the markets quietly.
Guild of Lions watches the markets quietly.
Levies rumored to secure textiles; officials say caravans delayed.
Guild of Lions watches the markets quietly.
Levies rumored to secure livestock; officials say caravans delayed.
Levies rumored to secure livestock; officials say caravans delayed.
Sons of the Wheel watches the markets quietly.
Levies rumored to secure fish; officials say caravans delayed.
Merciful Council of Langton watches the markets quietly.
Bargain prices on salt; traders racing to Waterhedge.
Merciful Council of Langton watches the markets quietly.

npcs.name: Gazeta

relationships.history: The debt was financial; the cost was higher.
Shared a cell, or a foxhole, or both.

npcs.title: Master
npcs.appearance: graying at the temples despite apparent youth

relationships.history: Survived a dangerous journey together.
Owe each other debts that gold cannot repay.

quirks: always knows which way is north
sleeps with a blade in hand

npcs.name: Adula

relationships.history: The debt was financial; the cost was higher.

npcs.name: Jilfte

relationships.history: Only one of them can have what they both want.
Words were said that cannot be unsaid.

relationships.history: Blood spilled between them in Mensfield.
Interest compounds, and so does resentment.
